SEARCH
Package com.nathcat.messagecat_database

Class MySQLHandler

java.lang.Object
com.nathcat.messagecat_database.MySQLHandler
public class MySQLHandler extends Object
This class handles calls to the MySQL database made through the Database class.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MySQLHandler()
    Default constructor, creates a connection to the database.
